title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million euros is roughly increasing from 2005/06 to 2008/09, roughly constant from 2008/09 to 2010/11, slightly increasing from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and finally slightly decreasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 2010/11 to 2011/12.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
The highest Revenue in million euros, of value 2795.7 was reached at Year 2011/12
Minimum Revenue in million euros about 700.45 was reached at Year 2005/06
